LanguageData.AridShrubland.label: arid shrubland
LanguageData.AridShrubland.description: A dry region, but not dry enough to become a true desert. Open plains with grasses and bushes give way to scattered groves of trees. Plants are hardy and there is a moderate density of animals.
LanguageData.Desert.label: desert
LanguageData.Desert.description: A very dry, hot area which supports little life.
LanguageData.ExtremeDesert.label: extreme desert
LanguageData.ExtremeDesert.description: An extremely hot, dry area, devoid of almost all living creatures. Immense heat and limited vegetation make it very difficult to survive here, even for well-adapted animals.
